Negroni

  1. 1 oz gin (Plymouth Gin)
  2. 1 oz sweet vermouth (Cocchi Storico Vermouth di Torino)
  3. 1 oz campari

Pour ingredients into ice-filled rocks glass and stir. Garnish with orange twist.

By the Numbers

Strength Per Sip (ABV)

28%
average strength

Total Alcohol

1.4 shots
